entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries and ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
